practice_phrases.known: Can I go?
Can I come?
Can I go later?
Can I come today?
Can I go with you now?
Can I come back tomorrow?
Can I go to the store with you?
Can I come to your house later today?
practice_phrases.target: ¿Puedo venir a tu casa luego hoy?

practice_phrases.known: Can I have something to eat before we go?
practice_phrases.target: ¿Puedo tener algo para comer antes de ir?

practice_phrases.known: Can I tell you something important right now?
Ask you something
Ask you now
I want to ask you
Can I ask you?
I need to ask you something
I want to ask you now
I need to ask you something important today
Can I ask you about this later?
I want to ask you something before you go
practice_phrases.target: Quiero preguntarte algo antes de que te vayas

practice_phrases.known: I really need to ask you something right now
practice_phrases.target: Realmente necesito preguntarte algo ahora mismo

practice_phrases.known: I want to ask you something very important now
